tool_description: Monitors inventory levels and generates alerts for low stock, overstock, or other inventory anomalies.

monitoring_scope.description: Product IDs or categories to monitor

alert_types.description: Types of alerts to check: low_stock, out_of_stock, overstock, slow_moving

low_stock_threshold_pct.description: Percentage of reorder point to trigger low stock alert (10-50)

overstock_threshold_pct.description: Percentage above normal stock level to trigger overstock alert (150-500)

slow_moving_days.description: Days without sales to consider item slow moving (30-365)

priority_products.description: High-priority product IDs that require immediate attention

error_messages: Invalid alert type: Use low_stock, out_of_stock, overstock, or slow_moving.
Invalid threshold: low_stock_threshold_pct must be 10-50, overstock_threshold_pct must be 150-500.
Invalid timeframe: slow_moving_days must be between 30-365.
Monitoring scope too large: Reduce the number of products/categories to monitor.
No products found: None of the specified products exist in the system.
usage: Specify monitoring_scope and alert_types. Configure thresholds and timeframes as needed. Set priority_products for critical items requiring immediate alerts.

alert_types_found.description: Types of alerts that were triggered

priority_alerts.description: Number of alerts for priority products

alert_details.description: Detailed alert descriptions for each triggered alert

timestamp.description: When the alert check was performed
